title: Allman Brothers Band - 1996-06-22 Perforning Arts Center, Darien
description:
The Allman Brothers Band
Performing Arts Center
Darien Lake
Darien Center, NY
June 22, 1996

16 bit version from the collection of chopper7

Transferred and mastered by }{eywood
Lineage: Maxell XLII 90 cassettes (1) > Optimus SCT-57 playback deck > Adobe Audition 1.5 (recording at 24/96, phase correction, speed correction, EQ, normalization, splits & fades, conversion to 16/44.1, peak limiting) > TLH > (SBE fix, flac 8)

In my quest to share my tremendous archive of Buffalo, NY area concerts with the world on private bootleg trading trackers I've come across several narrow-minded artists that don't approve of digital sharing of their music. The Allman Brothers is one of those groups.  This has caused me to bring these shows here where they will not only reach a much larger audience, but they will also never die.  I guess their plan backfired, eh?

So with a big FUCK YOU to Gregg Allman, Dickey Betts and their fellow bandmembers' trading policies, I bring you this excellent recording from Darien Lake in 1996

01 tuneups
02 Don't Want You No More
03 It's Not My Cross to Bear
04 Ain't Wastin' Time No More
05 Ramblin' Man
06 Good Clean Fun
07 Hoochie Coochie Man
08 Tombstone Eyes
09 Stand Back
10 In Memory of Elizabeth Reed
11 I Know I Oughta Leave
12 Stormy Monday
13 End of the Line
14 No One to Run With
15 Back Where It All Begins

16 Blue Sky
17 Dreams
18 Whipping Post
